Thank you very much, STFmaryville.  I'm sorry I missed your comments on the Gotham by Gaslight torrent.  I will check them out.   I download the torrents through the magnet link.  Is there any way to download only a portion of a torrent through magnet links?  I would prefer not to have to download a 7 GB file to just get one book.  Thanks again for everything.

absolutely! when you click the magnet link, be patient and let the content list of the big-ass torrent load. then you can uncheck all the boxes, and put a check mark beside the one book you want!

(the above is written based on the uTorrent 3.3 software interface. of course your option could vary if you use something different!)

and no worries, i'm not upset, i am just so busy that i couldn't/can't upload a torrent of them. but wanted to send you in the right direction!

If you are using Bittorrent or Utorrent, everytime you click on "Get this Torrent" and you should be getting a pop-up listing all the files that can be dl-ed.  Just click on the Select None icon and then select what files you want to dl.

That way will cut down on the huge dl.
